name: BunnRun
description:
My first game in Unity! yay!

press space to jump (or left mouse!); the longer you hold it down, the higher you jump!

BunnRun is a game about a rabbit jumping over obstacles until he hits one or the player gets bored and leaves.

This is a work in progress, so there's not much to see. (yet!) 

0.2.3: new cactus mesh and lighting tweaks
